  This website provides information about our store. Online transactions are coming soon.

Serving

• Prep: 15 mins

• Cook: 10 mins

• Total: 25 mins

• Servings: 2 servings

• Yield: 1 pizza

Ingredients

• 1 tablespoon tomato paste

• 1 tablespoon water

• Salt, to taste

• 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour

• 1 (175 grams) ball store-bought or homemade pizza dough

• 3 ounces burrata cheese, cut into 1-inch pieces

• 4 thin slices proscuitto, torn in half lengthwise

• 1/2 cup lightly packed argula leaves

• Extra-virgin olive oil, for drizzling

• 1/4 cup shvaed Parmesan cheese
